law.catch_line: Part II of this subtitle does not apply to an elevator unit that is:...

text.section:
Part II of this subtitle does not apply to an elevator unit that is:
installed in a privately owned single-family residential dwelling; or
installed in a building or structure under federal control or regulation.
Sections 5-205(j), 5-207, 5-214, 5-215, and 5-216 and Title 5, Subtitle 8 of the Labor and Employment Article apply to Part II of this subtitle.
